data.eml:eml: FBIP: Endophytic bacterial communities in the fynbos biome

Endophytic bacteria associated with 3 fynbos plant species (Erepsia anceps, Leucadendron laureolum, Phaenocoma prolifera), with collection locality data, Genbank accession numbers and Identification of bacteria based on the 16S rRNA gene sequence. The data is found in the NCBI Sequence Read Archive and are available under the project number SRP059346.
